As you hear the breath of your Sister/Owner regulating and slowing as she falls asleep, you lie awake beneath her pretty little toes and think. At first you wonder why you're having trouble sleeping, and blame it on a number of things- the odor, the head, the constrictive environment, but eventually you realise that it's actually all about your current prediciment. Things have changed a lot in the past twenty-four hours, and you need to be sure what you're going to do.

Yesterday, you had been big strong Alex with friends and a girlfriend and a life and a part time job and now you were miniaturized, reduced to the size of a bug and the sock and toes of your Sister instead of a bed. How had that happened? How could your life change so drastically and quickly?

You find yourself thinking about what Taren had said earlier, about you belonging under her feet and worshipping her like a Goddess. That was the strangest thing about all of it- the fact that you're annoying kid sister now had complete control over your life, and you weren't sure you even had a problem with that.

Now that was the question that plagued you: Is this your fate? It took you all of four minutes to act like an obedient little foot toy for your Aunt, and you remember not really minding when Teran wore your Aunt's sandle earlier, her foot pressing down on you. You remember your whole life, all of those memories of your Sister's feet being part of your life- the dipping of her toes into your cereal and then giggling when you still drank all the milk defiantly, her placing her feet on your face and demanding you kiss them while you were trapped under the couch- it's as if Teran's feet were meant to be a part of your world, right?

You contemplate in the dark a lifetime of living at your sisters feet. No more friends, no girlfriend or adult life of your own, just Teran and her feet and her somewhat cruel and playful behavior and arrogance, now intensifed because you're the size of a bug. The hard part was that she was your sister, you little annoying sister. It would be better if it was your grilfriend or something...but then again, it does seem to feel right. Perhaps this was your and Teran's fate- she was meant to be big and you small. She was meant to be powerful, and you were meant to be insignifigant. You were meant to be a toy, a plaything, a little worshipper as Taren grows up and have a normal life. Part of you likes that idea, knows it feels right.

But then again, you kind of want a normal life, don't you?

You look up into those dark toes above you, and make a decision.

13.content:
As you make your way down the hallway, carpet vibrates around your waist slightly. Then it does it again. You begin to realize that there are footsteps approaching -- you look to the end of the enormous hallway and see something which suddenly terrifies you... your little sister is moving quickly in your direction, and she's tall as a tower, and dressed for Halloween.

"Teran!!" you scream, but she doesn't hear you at her size. Her long brown hair sways from side to side, and you can't help but notice how flawless her giant face seems, so far away. She has a witch's hat on, as well as a long black cloak. Realizing she could step on you, you glance down noticing that she's barefoot. You were wise enough to walk along the side of the hallway, however, out of her path.

She walks past you, and you are nearly knocked to your feet as her giant barefoot impacts the carpet near you. "Crud," you say, picking yourself up, as you watch your huge sister pass by. And you watch--and slap yourself in the face--as she walks into the guest room, right where you were to begin with. All that trouble to get to the hallway, and you would've probably got help sooner if you'd stayed put!

"Allleeex!" you hear your sister say in the guest room, in her patented 'annoying little sister' voice. "Hey, where'd he go?" you hear her say again, and hear her flipping through the sheets, tossing pillows out of the way. Frustrated at your own poor judgment, you dash back towards the guest room, trying not to trip.

As you finally reach the door and turn the corner, you see your giant costumed sister on her knees, searching the floor. This is perfect, she must've dropped something you think. She'll be more likely to find you, if you can just get over there. You're exhausted, however, and struggle to catch your breath as you sprint--as well as you can manage--toward your now giant little sister.

When you get nearly halfway across the room, her giant brown eyes and pretty face happen to lift up, and fix in on your location. She must have finally seen you. You don't know what to expect. What if she thinks you're a bug? What if she just faints at first sight? You brace for something ranging from disgust or disbelief to cross her giant face, but it's not what you get.

"FOUND YA!" she laughs, and suddenly stands up to full height. It takes a moment to sink in. You're looking up at Teran decked out in witch garb, who's staring right back down at you. She's grinning down under the giant black "O" that was the rim of her witch's hat, with head cocked to the side a bit, apparently unsurprised and totally delighted by the fact that she's now towering over you.

"Wha... what's going on, Teran?" you squeak up to your giant little sister.

She just giggles. "I told you to quit being a jerk to me all the time! My friend Amy gave me a shrinking pill to use if you wouldn't start being nice to me, and since you were mean to me on the way here... I dropped it in your coke!" she snickered.

"Why you! Make me big again!!" you scream, but she just laughs down.

"No! I'm gonna make you pay now that I've got a LITTLE brother to pick on!" she laughs, sticking out her tongue. "Guess what I'm gonna do to you FIRST?" she grins, obnoxiously. "Guess! Guess! Guess!" she mocks.

133.content:
...smell my feet," Teran smirks down, commandingly.

"What! No way!" you yell, but she just giggles down at you.

"I wasn't ASKING," she grins, lifting her giant foot up in the air. The bottom of her foot is huge to you, and at your size you don't want to be caught under it. You begin to bolt, but only manage to trip over the carpet fibers in your fright. You roll over facing upwards, to see Teran's giant sole becoming larger in your vision.

"Stop it!" you cry, pleading with your giant costumed sister. She's grinning delightedly down at you, there's not much hope of her listening. Sure enough, her sole continues to lower until touches the tops of the carpet fibers, blocking out any view of her face, costume, or witch hat.

"Smell my foot NOW or I'll step on you," she snickers. Staring at the flesh-colored wall above you for a moment, you decide to obey. Besides, her feet can't--you take a whiff--well, you guess they can smell pretty strong. They just smell like dirt and sweat so you're not about to puke or anything, but it is pretty humiliating.

"Gross, Teran, stop it," you complain. In response, she just giggles and presses down, mashing you into the carpet. This isn't fair, you think. In the darkness, you push against her giant foot... you're not used to Teran having any power over you.

Just then, footsteps could be heard in the hall...

1331.content:
Pressed flat into the carpet, you can only hear what's happening above you. Auntie Elaine enters the room--you can hear her muffled voice--and Teran's giant smelly sole presses you flat into the carpet, depressing the air from your lungs. You can't say a word, as you hear your aunt talking:

"Here's the rest of your costume, sweetie, this is the smallest broom I could find," she says. You can feel the vibrations of her footsteps as she walks over to Teran, who has her foot planted firmly on you.

"Thanks Auntie Elain," Teran says, also muffled above you. You try to struggle, but it only hurts to try to fight the force of your sister's weight on top of you. You're glad the carpet is so soft.

"I found these black nylons and boots too, they'll look perfect with the rest of your outfit. Witches don't go around barefoot, now do they?" Elain grins, dropping everything on the floor next to Teran. "I'll let you get changed, sweetie," she says, heading for the door. "Hey, do you know what happened to your brother?" she turns and asked right before she leaves.

"Oh, he went back home with Mom, he wasn't feeling good," you hear your sister lie. You feel a rush of anger, and push against the bottom of her foot with all your might. All you accomplish is draining yourself, she doesn't budge at all, and you suddenly feel like your lungs are about to burn a hole in you due to the lack of air.

"Oh, okay," Elain replies, and walks out of the room, closing the door behind her.

Great, you think, as your sister's stinky foot slowly lifts off of you. You breathe in the fresh air, but also look toward the sky at her giant smirking face, knowing why she's grinning. You're the size of a bug, and she's got you all to herself, all week.

"Wow, that's perfect," Teran laughs.

"Ugh, what?" you reply, disgusted with the whole situation.

Teran grins, walking over to the pile of stuff on the floor dropped by your aunt, "...they're the perfect place to stash you while I go trick or treating!" she laughs.

"What are you talking about!" you yell in frustration.

133122.content:
Her boot didn't smell too bad, she had to have bought these specifically for her costume. You slowly got up, only to be hit by the giant wall that was Terran's fluffy, red sock. They caught you, dragging you across the insole and beneath them, your lower body under the ball of her foot, the rest under her toes. She must've prepared these socks just for you because the smell was rank. It was a thick, red sock but the color had long started to fade from wear. The smell was rancid and cheesy, assaulting your nose. You could hear Terran's muffled laugh as she scrunched her toes, forcing your head deep into the filthy fabric, pressing sweat out of it and into your face. They continued to play with you for a bit, caking your upper body in filthy sweat and making sure you wouldn't get her smell off your body for a long time, even if you manage to get out of this mess.

She finally let go, leaving you coughing for the thick, rancid air, only for her entire foot to press down... Terran was walking, getting her costume ready and putting you through hell. The sock was luckily soft enough to not obliterate you, yet it still hurt like hell as the soft material molded around you, not giving you any space as even more sweat was pressed onto you. And what's worse was that Terran didn't even head out yet, meaning things would be a lot worse once she was skipping about, sweating even more than she already did. You weren't sure if you could survive that, let alone if you wanted to.
133122.title: Undesock

choices: She leaves and you remain trapped in the boot
She picks you up and takes you to her room
1331222.content: You try your hardest to move your limbs, but you are incased by your sisters slim feet. You hear a muffled booming voice through the slowing saturating fabric "ready... to... candy?" you assume that your aunt and Terran are about to leave to go trick or treating "yes" a familiar voice says and a corresponding scrunch of her toes reminds you of what's to come. You feel the force of every step slam into you as they walk ouside. The night drags on as you are constantly being pushed deeper and deeper into the sole of the boot. You imagine what it would be like if the boot wasn't new, a shudder runs through your body. Just as your body is becoming adjusted to the "special treatment" Terran's thick socks started to dampen and each step coats your body with sweat. The night continues for 2 more hours of getting pushed into the insole and coated with layers of sweat. As your conscience starts to fade her hear a faint door lock "I'm going to bed, I'm exhausted from walking around for 4 hours" you perk up finally realizing that you will be freed from your prison. As the red socks are lifted from the boot, you realize how much of the smell has been ingrained into the boot. You wait for your capture to toy with you but all you hear are light snores. "she forgot me...forgot...ME!!" you feel angry and many more emotions as you try to get up but it's then that you realize that the sweat has stuck you down to the insole, but before you can clear your head and hear your aunts voice "oh she's asleep already, those boots are so cute I wonder if they will fit me? " dread fills your body.

info.brief_description: A teenage boy shrinks at his aunt and cousin's house.
info.description:
Your name is Alex, you are a 16 year old boy who is visiting his aunt Elain out of state with your little sister Taren. You also have a 7 year old cousin Megan. Just a few rules:

-Absolutly no men or boys except for the main character
-No killing off the main character
-No butt holes, cheek is fine
-Shrinking only, No growing
-No furries or animals
-No age changing or unbirthing
